title: The words, ‘Ahad’ and ‘Waahid’ in the Quran - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: the word occurs in the Quran once in Surah chapter number 112 verse number one the second derivative occurs in the Quran more than 20 times in Sur Bak chter number 2 verse number 133 in Sur Bak chapter number 2 verse number 163 in Surah chapter number 4 verse number 171 in Sur chter number 5 verse number 73 in Surah chapter number 9 verse number 31 in s Yu chapter number 12 verse number 39 in s chapter number 13 verse number 16 in s ibraim chapter number 14 verse number 48 in Ibrahim chapter number 14 verse number 52 inah chapter number 16 verse number 14 it's mentioned in Surah K chapter number 18 vers 110 in Surah Amia chapter number 21 vers 108 then kab chapter number 29 verse number 46 and Surah saf chapter number 37 verse number four in Surah chapter number 38 verse number 5 in Surah chapter number 38 verse number 65 in Surah chapter number 39 verse number 4 in chter number 40 verse number 16 and in Sur chter number 41 verse number 6 it occurs in the Quran no less than 21 times the word one
